descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!Daedalus requires at least {diskSpaceRequired} of hard drive space to operate. Your computer is missing {diskSpaceMissing} of available space. Please delete some files to increase available hard drive space to continue using Daedalus.

It is recommended to have at least 15% of hard drive space available ({diskSpaceRecommended} in your case) for normal and stable operation of the operating system and installed programs. We strongly recommend that you free up at least that amount of space from your hard drive.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Attention, Daedalus is unable to sync with the blockchain because the time on your machine is different from the global time. Your time is off by 2 hours 12 minutes 54 seconds.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!To synchronise the time and fix the issue, please read our {supportPortalLink} article.
descriptors.description: Second paragraph of Sync error overlay

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Attention, Daedalus is unable to check if the clock on your computer is synchronized with global time because NTP (Network Time Protocol) servers are unreachable, possibly due to firewalls on your network.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!If your computer clock is off by more than 15 seconds, Daedalus will be unable to connect to the network. If you have this issue, please read our Support Portal article to synchronize the time on your machine.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!This is a legacy wallet which uses legacy addresses and does not support new features. Please move all of the ada from this legacy wallet to one of the wallets where new features are available. You can also create a brand new wallet for your ada in case you don’t want to move ada to one of your existing wallets. A sequence of screens will guide you through the process.

Learn more action of legacy notification.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Move all of the ada from this wallet

Title for the Data Layer Migration screen.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!You have installed a version of Daedalus that changes how wallet data is stored and managed. Because of this, all of your wallets need to be restored and synchronized with the complete history of the Cardano blockchain.
descriptors.description: Content for the Data Layer Migration screen.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!This is an automatic process and does not require any action on your behalf.
descriptors.description: Content for the Data Layer Migration screen.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Your transaction history and used addresses will appear in your wallets as they are recovered during the restoration process. Addresses that were not used will not be recovered because they are not recorded on the blockchain. If funds were sent to those addresses you will receive the funds and those addresses will appear in your wallet.
descriptors.description: Content for the Data Layer Migration screen.

Headline for the Decentralisation notification.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Cardano will soon start its transition from a federated to a decentralized system. This will mark the start of stakeholders being able to earn rewards for participating in the running of the network. They will be able to participate directly in the process of staking or can delegate their stake to stake pools to earn rewards in ada.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Cardano is transitioning to a decentralized system
descriptors.description: Headline for the Decentralization progress notification.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Cardano is transitioning from a federated to a decentralized system. During this transition, some new blocks will be produced by nodes operated in a federated way and some by nodes run by ada stakeholders. All rewards will be distributed to ada stakeholders and none to operators of federated nodes.
descriptors.description: Info description for the Decentralization progress notification.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!The paper wallet certificate will not be associated with any of your existing wallets. A new, empty wallet will be created.
descriptors.description: subtitle2 for the "Paper wallet create certificate instructions dialog".
Instructions list label for the "Paper wallet create certificate instructions dialog".

descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!Your printed certificate will include your paper wallet recovery phrase
      of {paperWalletRecoveryPhraseWordCount} words. Note that your paper wallet recovery phrase is
      different to the {walletRecoveryPhraseWordCount}-word recovery phrases used to restore your
      regular Daedalus wallet.
descriptors.description: Wallet certificate create instructions dialog definition 1.

descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!For security reasons, the last {paperWalletWrittenWordsCount} words of your
      paper wallet recovery phrase will not be printed on the paper wallet certificate itself. You
      will need to write them on your certificate by hand in a moment.
descriptors.description: Wallet certificate create instructions dialog definition 2.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Use the address on your certificate to send funds to your paper wallet.
descriptors.description: Wallet certificate create instructions dialog definition 3.

descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!Your paper wallet will be offline so will not be held in Daedalus.
      To check the balance of the wallet, input the address on the certificate into
descriptors.description: Wallet certificate create instructions dialog definition 4.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Store your certificate containing your paper wallet recovery phrase in a safe place.
descriptors.description: Wallet certificate create instructions dialog definition 5.

descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!When you click “Save PDF file for printing” you will be prompted
      to choose a location on your computer where the PDF file will be saved. After that
      open the saved PDF file and print it.
descriptors.description: Wallet certificate create instructions dialog - printing instructions.
Wallet certificate create instructions dialog "Cardano Explorer" label
"Wallet certificate create instructions dialog" print button label.
Headline for the "Paper wallet create certificate print dialog".

descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!Check your paper wallet certificate and make sure everything
      is readable and correctly printed. You can test this by scanning the QR code with
      a QR scanner application on your mobile phone.
descriptors.description: "Paper wallet create certificate print dialog" subtitle.

descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!Your certificate is not yet complete and does not contain all
      the data needed to restore your paper wallet. In the next step, you will need to
      write down an additional {paperWalletWrittenWordsCount} words to your paper wallet recovery phrase.
descriptors.description: "Paper wallet create certificate print dialog" info.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Yes, the paper wallet certificate printed successfully.
descriptors.description: "Paper wallet create certificate print dialog" certificate printed confirmation.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Yes, first {paperWalletPrintedWordsCount} words of the paper wallet recovery phrase are readable.
descriptors.description: "Paper wallet create certificate print dialog" certificate readable confirmation.
"Paper wallet create certificate print dialog" QR scannable confirmation.
Headline for the "Paper wallet create certificate securing password dialog".

descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!To complete your paper wallet certificate you will need to
      write the remaining {paperWalletWrittenWordsCount} words of your paper wallet recovery
      phrase on your certificate.
descriptors.description: "Paper wallet create certificate securing password dialog" first info label.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!The password can optionally be written on the certificate or kept securely in other location. Here is the placeholder on the certificate intended for your password.
descriptors.description: You may write the remaining words here:

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!I have written the remaining {paperWalletWrittenWordsCount} words on the certificate.
descriptors.description: "Paper wallet create certificate securing password dialog" secure password confirmation.
Headline for the "Paper wallet create certificate verification dialog".

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Enter your paper wallet recovery phrase to verify your paper wallet certificate.
descriptors.description: "Paper wallet create certificate verification dialog" subtitle.

descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!Make sure you enter all {fullPhraseWordCount} words for the paper wallet recovery phrase,
     first {printedWordCount} words printed on the certificate followed by the {writtenWordCount} words you wrote by hand.
descriptors.description: "Paper wallet create certificate verification dialog" subtitle.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!I understand that my paper wallet can be recovered only by using my paper wallet certificate.
descriptors.description: "Paper wallet create certificate verification dialog" recovering understandance confirmation.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Do you have your wallet recovery phrase?
descriptors.description: Label for the recoveryPhraseVerificationTitle on wallet settings.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Funds in this wallet can only be recovered using the correct wallet recovery phrase, which is a unique 12-word string you were shown and asked to write down when creating this wallet. You can re-enter your wallet recovery phrase to verify that you have the correct recovery phrase for this wallet.
descriptors.description: Label for the recoveryPhraseVerificationDescription on wallet settings.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!We recommend that you verify your wallet recovery phrase in {timeUntilWarning}.
descriptors.description: Label for the recoveryPhraseVerificationNeverOk on wallet settings.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!We recommend that you verify your wallet recovery phrase.
descriptors.description: Label for the recoveryPhraseVerificationNeverWarning on wallet settings.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!We recommend that you verify your wallet recovery phrase.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!You verified the recovery phrase for this wallet {timeAgo}.
descriptors.description: Label for the recoveryPhraseVerificationCheckedWarning on wallet settings.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!You verified the recovery phrase for this wallet {timeAgo}. We recommend that you verify your wallet recovery phrase again.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!To verify that you have the correct recovery phrase for this wallet, you can enter it on the following screen. This wallet uses a 12-word recovery phrase.
descriptors.description: Label for the recoveryPhraseStep1Paragraph1 on wallet settings.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!You have verified the recovery phrase for this wallet. You can use it at any time to recover the funds in this wallet on another computer, even if using a different version of Daedalus.
descriptors.description: Label for the recoveryPhraseStep3Paragraph1 on wallet settings.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!Please make sure to return your wallet recovery phrase to a secure place for safekeeping. Anyone with access to your wallet recovery phrase can take control of your funds.
descriptors.description: Label for the recoveryPhraseStep3Paragraph2 on wallet settings.
Label for the recoveryPhraseStep3Button on wallet settings.
Label for the recoveryPhraseStep4Title on wallet settings.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!The wallet recovery phrase you have entered does not match the recovery phrase of this wallet. Make sure you have entered the wallet recovery phrase which was written down during the wallet creation process for this wallet and make sure the words are in the correct order.
descriptors.description: Label for the recoveryPhraseStep4Paragraph1 on wallet settings.

descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!If you are unable to verify your wallet recovery phrase, you should create a new wallet and move all of the funds from this wallet to the new wallet. If you do this, make sure you keep the wallet recovery phrase for the new wallet safe and secure.
